item.title: Text Editor in Dart
item.description: The purpose of this project is to reproduce and create a small text editor using the dart:html library. I am basing this project from the book Dart Scalable Application Develoment. This is just for the sake of knowledge and getting more familiar with dartlang. Try it You can try the text editor in this link Text Editor. Check the Source Code. Tutorial Part01
